Has anyone ever compared the performance of grammatical evolution to
neuro =
evolution? Perhaps on the standard problems pole-balancing, xor.

It seems =
quite promising and I can post my results when they are done.
But I wanted =
to see if anyone else has looked into it before I do.
I've invested quite a=
 bit of enery in NE but GE looks very promising,
and I like the fact that i=
t produces actual code rather than a black
box. Which makes it more appropr=
iate for some domains. ie commercial
video games.

http://www.grammatical-e=
volution.org/
